steps.intro: Welcome to the new Knowledgebase Solution experience. This short tour will highlight some of the new features.

steps.title: Step 1
steps.intro: Knowledgebase Solutions are now mobile-friendly, making them easy to view on all your devices. We've also relocated elements from the right sidebar to allow the main content to fill more of your screen.

steps.title: Step 2
steps.intro: No matter where you are on the page, you can comment, rate, or follow using the buttons on the left.

steps.title: Step 3
steps.intro: Now you can let us know if content is helpful to you. You and the community benefit by helping us improve content.

steps.title: Step 4
steps.intro: Comments have an updated look and feel and are now optimized for mobile.

steps.title: End
steps.intro: Thanks for taking the tour. Have feedback? Tell us about it here.
